Yousef Ourabi wrote:

>Hey,
>Sorry it took me so long to reply to my own question,
>I just got hit with my first round of midterms.
>  
>
Sorry it took me a while to get back to your reponse (smile).

You don't say what your platform is.   Your failing in the unit tests.  
You're probably on a Mac, a PC or a 2.6 kernel linux?  If the former, 
you'll need to make a source code change. If the latter, you'll need the 
latest 5.0 JDK (>beta2).  See '[ 984390 ] Build fails: "rws" mode and 
Mac OS X interact badly 
<http://crawler.archive.org/articles/limitations.html#984390>', in Known 
Limitations for details: 
http://crawler.archive.org/articles/limitations.html#984390.

>PS: I configured CVS through Eclipse and I saw two
>ArchiveOpenCrawler modules? Is this normal? Also I am
>assuming that is the right module?
>
>  
>
I've not noticed that before.  Interesting.  One of the lads here points 
out that the icons are slightly different.  I'm guessing its something 
to do with HEAD vs heritrix_1_0 branch.  Maybe someone else can explain it.

St.Ack
